ratings.en: Say what you want; famous games are usually fun
It Feels Awesome to Gain a Bunch of Levels After a battle
When a girl's your first friend, life feels like a date for a while
Sometimes you conquer a dungeon only to find a strong boss back in your village
The characters who become your friends after you clear a hard event usually have high stats
Once you start speedrunning the minigames, you seriously can't stop
When a mentor character becomes a boss, they'll push you to the edge
There are some problems that cannot be solved only by low-level characters
When you return to the first town with all your friends, new events will occur
Multiplayer games have their own special appeal
Sometimes just one option can change everything
Items that can only be equipped on the heroine have special effects
OVA 01: Post-Game Equipment for Girls Is a Little Different Than Usual
OVA 02: Most Strange Spell Names Have Unknown Origins
The best games make reconnaissance fun
A happy ending doesn't mean this game is over
Battles go better when you're fighting alongside someone whose signature move is the opposite of yours
Villagers have their own way of life
If you keep upgrading your initial equipment, it'll usually become your most powerful weapon
Everyone has different expectations about a big event
Important items are usually lying around in enchanted forests
